longBusinessSummary: Cheviot Company Limited manufactures and sells jute goods in India and internationally. The company offers jute products comprising hessian/burlaps, food grade bags, lightweight and heavy geotextiles, yarn, lifestyle fabrics and bags, sacks, and specialty fabrics; and packed and bulk tea products. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Budge Budge Amalgamated Mills Limited. The company was incorporated in 1897 and is based in Kolkata, India. Cheviot Company Limited is a subsidiary of Harsh Investments Private Limited.
